Description: Metastatic ovarian serous cystadenocarcinoma cell line
Embryonal kidney cell line, transformed by adenovirus type 5
Erythroleukemia cell line (AML M6 in relapse after treatment for Hodgkin's disease)
Metastatic embryonal carcinoma cell line, cloned from TERA-2
Metastatic poorly differentiated prostate adenocarcinoma cell line
Pre-B cell leukemia cell line (ALL, first relapse)
Urinary bladder transitional cell carcinoma cell line
Small cell lung carcinoma cell line
Metastatic neuroblastoma, clonal subline of neuroepithelioma cell line SK-N-SH
Cervical squamous cell carcinoma cell line, integrated 1-2 copies of HPV16
Multiple myeloma cell line (1984, in vitro differentiated)
